Class SocketClient

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.server.connections.SocketClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientConnection, Runnable, Remote
public class SocketClient extends Thread implements ClientConnection
Server side socket interfacing with a client connected using the TCP protocol.

    • SocketClient

      public SocketClient(Socket socket) throws IOException
      Constructs a new SocketClient object associated to the provided Socket.
      Parameters:
      socket - Socket open to the client's messages.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there are any errors during the transfer/connection process.

  • Method Details

    • setTimeout

      public void setTimeout(TimerTask task)
      Set a timeout regarding the completion of the connection procedure regarding this object.
      Parameters:
      task - A callback task to be executed in case of failure in the completion of the connection.

    • run

      public void run()
      Main loop in the SocketClient class, reads all incoming messages from the client, making sure the first one to be processed properly is a UsernameSetupMessage.
